data.message: So now all the bigots have stopped using FB. It's win win.

replies.message: If only they would stop leaving comments here…
They threaten to stop using it, but funny, they never seem to.
That's okay Nicholas Cervenka - who needs 'em?
Now, if only those (however many) moms would go away that (apparently) talked JCP into stop supporting Ellen!

Just because we do not want the gay lifestyle in our face doesn't make us haters. We disagree with the lifestyle but do not hate the people themselves. I know many gay and lesbian people and they know how to behave properly and with dignity in the public eye. What a person does sexually should be their private moments not a public display. My wife and I do not put on a performance in public and we expect the same courtesy from the gay community. I do not encourage hate towards gays and feel they should have all the rights heterosexuals do. I do not support Christian Church adoption of gay marriage but if gays get married in a civil way that is okay.
